basics.name: Jacob Elnaggar
basics.label: MD/PhD Candidate
basics.summary: MD/PhD candidate pursuing radiation oncology with a research focus on cancer biology and computational methods.

education.institution: Louisiana State University Health Sciences Center

work.name: MD Anderson Cancer Center
work.summary: Conducted translational microbiome and cancer research using molecular and computational methods in Dr. Lauren Colbert's lab.

volunteer.summary: Provided healthcare services to underserved populations in the New Orleans community.
Organized a donation drive and fundraiser raising over $2,000 and collecting multiple truckloads of supplies.
Volunteered at a shelter for individuals experiencing homelessness, assisting with repairs, meals, and coordination of student volunteers.
Counselor at a weeklong day camp for children with special needs, ensuring safety and engagement.
Hosted and guided medical school interviewees, representing LSUHSC to prospective students.
Trained peers and healthcare professional students in basic life support.

publications.name: Predicting bacterial vaginosis development using artificial neural networks
publications.summary: Elnaggar JH, Lammons JW, Ardizzone C, Aaron KJ, Jacobs C, Graves KJ, George SM, Luo M, Tamhane A, Łaniewski P, Quayle AJ, Herbst-Kralovetz M, Cerca N, Muzny CA, Taylor CM. DOI: 10.1101/2025.05.02.25326872

publications.name: Tumor-resident Lactobacillus iners confer chemoradiation resistance through lactate-induced metabolic rewiring
publications.summary: Colbert LE, El Alam MB, Wang R, Karpinets T, Lo D, Lynn EJ, Harris TA, Elnaggar JH, et al. DOI: 10.1016/j.ccell.2023.09.012

publications.name: HPV-related anal cancer is associated with changes in the anorectal microbiome during cancer development
publications.summary: Elnaggar JH, Huynh VO, Lin D, Hillman RT, Abana CO, El Alam MB, Tomasic KC, Karpinets TV, Kouzy R, Phan JL, Wargo J, Holliday EB, Das P, Mezzari MP, Ajami NJ, Lynn EJ, Minsky BD, Morris VK, Milbourne A, Messick CA, Klopp AH, Futreal PA, Taniguchi CM, Schmeler KM, Colbert LE. DOI: 10.3389/fimmu.2023.1051431

publications.name: A novel Gardnerella, Prevotella, and Lactobacillus standard that improves accuracy in quantifying vaginal microbial communities
publications.publisher: Frontiers in Cellular and Infection Microbiology
publications.summary: Elnaggar JH, Ardizzone CM, Cerca N, Toh E, Łaniewski P, Lillis RA, Herbst-Kralovetz M, Quayle AJ, Muzny CA, Taylor CM. DOI: 10.3389/fcimb.2023.1198113

publications.name: Characterization of vaginal microbial community dynamics in incident bacterial vaginosis: a pilot study
publications.summary: Elnaggar JH, Lammons JW, Taylor CM, Toh E, Ardizzone CM, Dong A, Aaron KJ, Luo M, Tamhane A, Lefkowitz EJ, Quayle AJ, Nelson DE, Muzny CA. DOI: 10.1097/OLQ.0000000000001821

publications.name: Precision combination therapies based on recurrent oncogenic co-alterations
publications.summary: Li X, Dowling EK, Yan G, Bozorgui B, Imarinad P, Elnaggar JH, Luna A, Menter DG, Kopetz S, Sander C, Korkut A. DOI: 10.1158/2159-8290.CD-21-0832

awards.title: Chancellor’s Award
